description: Kenton`s Golett participated in the Pok√©mon World Tournament Junior Cup at the Kagome Town stadium. In the first round it was in the second match and faced off against Manning`s Heatmor. The match quickly showcased Manning`s Heatmor finishing off Kenton`s Golett with Flamethrower to win the battle which allowed Manning to advance to the second round while Kenton was eliminated from the tournament.
name: Gobit (Kenta)
